content.body: It is excellent to hear that Alex Russell is so supportive. I think we should learn more about his thoughts here, eg in an email thread or we could invite him to one of our regular meetings. OTOH I donâ€™t think we should add syntax; I am curious why he suggested it.
The ideal case is that we can motivate Edge people to work with us on implementing AsyncContext
Alex can probably leverage a lot of resources on the edge side. Maybe also for devtools and html expertise
